TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DirListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 顯示執行階段的目錄和路徑。

span.span: Displays directories and paths at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控制項來顯示階層式清單的目錄。Use this control to display a hierarchical list of directories. 您可以建立對話方塊中，例如，讓使用者從清單中所有可用的目錄中檔案的開啟檔案。You can create dialog boxes that, for example, enable a user to open a file from a list of files in all available directories. 設定， ，和，讓使用者存取項目清單中的屬性。Set the , , and properties to enable a user to access items in a list. 如果您也會顯示和控制項，您可以撰寫程式碼以同步化它們與控制項並與彼此。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the control and with each other. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`DirListBox`控制項會在執行階段顯示的目錄與路徑。A `DirListBox` control displays directories and paths at run time. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的內容已變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Change`就會發生事件時的選擇控制的變更，當使用者按兩下新的目錄或當您變更屬性設定，透過程式碼。The `Change` event occurs when the selection in a control changes, either when the user double-clicks a new directory or when you change the property setting through code. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Gets the items that are contained in a control's list portion.

value.span: ，包含指定項目的目錄和路徑。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來存取清單的項目。Use this property to access list items. `DirList`屬性的運作方式與搭配和屬性。The `DirList` property works together with the and properties. 如控制項，`Index`數字順序根據目前的目錄和子目錄時在執行階段建立控制項。For a control, the `Index` number sequence is based on the current directories and subdirectories when the control is created at run time. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來傳回目前所選目錄中的子目錄的數目。Use this property to return the number of subdirectories in the currently selected directory. `DirListCount`屬性的運作方式與搭配和屬性。The `DirListCount` property works together with the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中目前選取項目的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected item in a control.
An that represents the index of the currently selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來傳回目前所選取目錄的索引。Use this property to return the index of the currently selected directory. `DirListIndex`屬性的運作方式與搭配和屬性。The `DirListIndex` property works together with the and properties. 運算式`instance.DirList(instance.DirListIndex)`傳回目前所選取目錄的字串。The expression `instance.DirList(instance.DirListIndex)` returns the string for the currently selected directory. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool Disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (Disposing As Boolean)

param.name: Disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 控制項所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a control and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當您覆寫，請確定未參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When you override , make sure not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnBackColorChanged`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The `OnBackColorChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnChanged`方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The `OnChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中的目前路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the current path in a control.
A that represents the path of the currently selected directory.

value.span: 預設為控制項在執行階段中建立的目前路徑。

span.span: The default is the current path when the control is created at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您在建立應用程式的檔案瀏覽和管理功能，請使用這個屬性。Use this property when you are building an application's file-browsing and manipulation capabilities. 當您將`Path`屬性的效果是 MS-DOS 的效果類似`chdir`命令; 相對路徑或磁碟機規格不啟用。When you set the `Path` property, the effects are similar to the effects of the MS-DOS `chdir` command; relative paths are enabled with or without a drive specification. 如果您指定的磁碟機以冒號 （:），會選取該磁碟機上目前的目錄。If you specify only a drive with a colon (:),the current directory on that drive is selected. `Path`屬性也可以設定的完整的網路路徑不含磁碟機連線使用下列語法：The `Path` property can also be set to a qualified network path without a drive connection using the following syntax: ``` \\servername\sharename\path ``` 值變更`Path`如控制項產生事件。Changing the value of `Path` for a control generates an event. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 強制控制項使其工作區失效，並且立即重繪其本身。

span.span: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 當您覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法，使失效並且重繪控制項和其子控制項。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure to call the method so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::SelectionMode SelectionMode { System::Windows::Forms::SelectionMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::SelectionMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 中，用來選取項目的方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the method in which items are selected in a .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不應該設定為控制項等控制項，只是因為，為了控制項繼承自。This property should not be set for the control; it is provided only because the control inherits from . > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 取得值，指出 中的項目是否依照字母順序排序。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the items in a are sorted alphabetically.

value.span: 如果控制項中的項目已經排序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if items in the control are sorted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如控制項，`Sorted`一律傳回 false。For the control, `Sorted` always returns false. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

span.span: Gets or sets the property to use as the actual value for the items in a .

The default is an empty string ("").
